extension.summary: Backup LibreELEC system to local or remote storage
extension.description: Automatically backup your LibreELEC system to local or remote storage (SMB, NFS, FTP, SFTP, WebDAV). Configurable backup schedule, compression level, and retention policy.
extension.news:

v1.0.0 (2025-03-11) - Initial release - Basic backup and restore functionality - Support for local and remote storage - Configurable backup schedule - Compression level options - Retention policy settings
